isis.stitle: CAB: 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 AND 8600 MODELS - INSTALL - OUTER CAB DOOR HANDLE

svcsubproc.title: Install Front Cab Door Outer Cab Door Handle on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 88 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Install door lock cylinder lever (Item 2) on outer cab door handle (Item 3), driver side shown.
Install door lock control rod (Item 1) into door lock cylinder lever (Item 2) on outer cab door handle (Item 3), driver side shown.

Install front cab door lock cylinder, refer to
CAB DOOR LOCK CYLINDER
. For installing front cab door lock cylinder, refer to Install Cab Door Lock Cylinder on Front Cab Door of Standard Cab or Extended Cab Models and Front and Rear Cab Doors of Crew Cab Models.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 87 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: If the hanger support bracket (Item 2) was removed from outer cab door handle (Item 1), position the slot (Item 3) in the hanger support bracket over the T shaped locking tab (item 4) on the outer cab door handle and rotate hanger support bracket clockwise to lock it in place, driver side shown.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 86 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Slide control rod (Item 5) coming from the cab door latch (Item 4) into mounting hole at the top of outer cab door handle (Item 2). Rotate outer cab door handle to position it on the control rod properly, driver side shown.
Slide the control rod (Item 1) coming from the outer cab door handle (Item 2) into the lock lever (Item 3) of the cab door latch (Item 4), driver side shown.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 85 for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

step1.para: With the front cab door modular door hardware assembly (Item 1, Figure 73) placed on a suitable work surface. Position the hanger support bracket (Item 4) of the outer cab door handle (Item 1) in place at window run channel (Item 2) and slide the hanger support bracket into window run channel until the locking tab (Item 3) locks it in place, driver side shown.

Install front cab door modular door hardware assembly, refer to
MODULAR DOOR HARDWARE ASSEMBLY
. For installing front cab door modular door hardware assembly, refer to Install Front Cab Door Modular Door Hardware Assembly on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.

Install front cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to
CAB DOOR INNER DOOR PANEL WATER SHIELD
. For installing front cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to Install Front Cab Door Inner Door Panel Water Shield on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.

Install front cab door trim panel, refer to
CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL
. If front cab door is equipped with electric door window and locks, refer to Install Front Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Door Window and Locks on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models. If front cab door is equipped with manual door window and locks, refer to Install Front Cab Door Trim Panel with Manual Door Window and Locks on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.

Repeat procedure to install passenger side outer cab door handle on front cab door on Standard Cab and Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.

svcsubproc.title: Install Rear Cab Door Outer Cab Door Handle on Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 88 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Install door lock cylinder lever (Item 2) on outer cab door handle (Item 3), driver side shown.
Install door lock control rod (Item 1) into door lock cylinder lever (Item 2) on outer cab door handle (Item 3), driver side shown.

Install rear cab door lock cylinder, refer to
CAB DOOR LOCK CYLINDER
. For installing rear cab door lock cylinder, refer to Install Cab Door Lock Cylinder on Front Cab Door of Standard Cab or Extended Cab Models and Front and Rear Cab Doors of Crew Cab Models.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 87 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: If the hanger support bracket (Item 2) was removed from outer cab door handle (Item 1), position the slot (Item 3) in the hanger support bracket over the T shaped locking tab (item 4) on the outer cab door handle and rotate hanger support bracket clockwise to lock it in place, driver side shown.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 86 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Slide control rod (Item 5) coming from the cab door latch (Item 4) into mounting hole at the top of outer cab door handle (Item 2). Rotate outer cab door handle to position it on the control rod properly, driver side shown.
Slide the control rod (Item 1) coming from the outer cab door handle (Item 2) into the lock lever (Item 3) of the cab door latch (Item 4), driver side shown.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 85 for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

step1.para: With the rear cab door modular door hardware assembly (Item 1, Figure 75) placed on a suitable work surface. Position the hanger support bracket (Item 4) of the outer cab door handle (Item 1) in place at window run channel (Item 2) and slide the hanger support bracket into window run channel until the locking tab (Item 3) locks it in place, driver side shown.

Install rear cab door modular door hardware assembly, refer to
MODULAR DOOR HARDWARE ASSEMBLY
. For installing rear cab door modular door hardware assembly, refer to Install Rear Cab Door Modular Door Hardware Assembly on Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.

Install rear cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to
CAB DOOR INNER DOOR PANEL WATER SHIELD
. For installing rear cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to Install Rear Cab Door Inner Door Panel Water Shield on Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.

Install rear cab door trim panel, refer to
CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL
. If rear cab door is equipped with electric door window and locks, refer to Install Rear Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Door Window and Locks on Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models. If rear cab door is equipped with manual door window and locks, refer to Install Rear Cab Door Trim Panel with Manual Door Window and Locks on Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.
Repeat procedure to install passenger side outer cab door handle on rear cab door of crew cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.
